title: Korean Festivals Data — festival_data
text: festival_data returns raw data frame containing detailed information festivals Korea, including names, locations, dates, additional details Korean English. English translations done =googletranslate() Google Sheets, may accurate.

title: Korean Festivals Data — festival_data
text: data frame 27 variables: festival_kr name festival Korean. festival_en English translation festival's name. place place festival held, Korean. place_en English translation festival's location. begin_date start date festival. end_date end date festival. contents Description festival Korean. contents_en English translation festival's description. organizer organizer festival Korean. organizer_en English translation organizer's name. address address festival location Korean. address_en English translation address. address_old_style old-style address Korean. address_old_en English translation old-style address. latitude Latitude coordinate festival location. longitude Longitude coordinate festival location. updated date data last updated. data_organization_code Code organization providing data. data_organization organization providing data, Korean. data_organization_en English translation data organization's name. columns Descriptions additional columns listed .

title: Korean Festivals Data — festival_data
text: https://www.data.go.kr/data/15013104/standard.

title: Korean Festivals Data — festival_data
text: Returns raw data frame containing information Korean festivals

title: International Students Data (Individual) — international_students_all_individual_data
text: international_students_all_individual_data dataset containing information individual international students Korea, including country origin, university, visa type, sex students.

title: International Students Data (Individual) — international_students_all_individual_data
text: data frame 5 variables: sex sex individual student. university_kr name university student attending Korean. iso3c ISO 3-letter country code. country English name student's country origin. type type visa held student (e.g., Language, Degree).

title: International Students Data (Individual) — international_students_all_individual_data
text: https://www.data.go.kr/data/15100039/fileData.

title: International Students Data (Individual) — international_students_all_individual_data
text: Returns raw data frame containing information international students Korea.

title: International Students Data — international_students_data
text: international_students_data dataset containing information international students Korea, including country origin, visa type, number students.

title: International Students Data — international_students_data
text: data frame 6 variables: year year data record. month month data record. visa type visa held student (e.g., Language, Degree). no_int_student number international students respective country visa type. iso3c ISO 3-letter country code. country English name student's country origin.

title: International Students Data — international_students_data
text: https://www.data.go.kr/data/15100039/fileData.

title: International Students Data — international_students_data
text: Returns raw data frame containing information international students Korea.

title: International Students Data (Schools) — status_of_foreign_students_data
text: status_of_foreign_students_data dataset containing information number international students Korean schools, including school's name, region, type school (university, cyber university, etc.), classification (private vs. public), field study, number students.

title: International Students Data (Schools) — status_of_foreign_students_data
text: data frame 7 variables: year year data record. type_of_school type school (e.g., university, cyber university). classification classification school (e.g., private, public). region region school located. school name school Korean. field field study. number_of_students number international students school per field.

title: International Students Data (Schools) — status_of_foreign_students_data
text: https://www.academyinfo.go.kr/uipnh/unt/unmcom/RdViewer.?paramSvyYr=2023&paramMjrItem1=00&paramFormClftCd=30&paramItemId=33&paramSchlDivCd=02&paramDiv=&paramItemDivCd=01&paramItemTimeCd=&paramItemDetailDivCd=&paramSchlKindCd=99&paramSchlEstabCd=99&paramZoneCd=99&paramSortItem=SCHL_NM&paramSortMethod=ASC&paramMjrCd=00&paramMjrItem2=00&paramMjrItem3=00&paramMjrItem4=00&paramMjrItem1Act=N&paramMjrItem4Act=N&paramMjrUsStp=0&paramSearchItem=SEARCH_SCHL_NM&tabIdx=&pageIdx=; https://www.data.go.kr/data/15050054/fileData.
